Research Consent
{{{b}}}Research Consent{{{/b}}}{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
You have been invited to participate in this research on short-term rental accommodation. You should have already received an explanatory statement that provides full details about the project. The following is a brief summary of the project.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Project title:{{{/b}}} Short Term Rental Accommodation Research Project{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
Short-term rental accommodation (STRA) refers to lodging options that are rented out for relatively brief periods, typically ranging from a few nights to a few weeks, as opposed to long-term leases or traditional hotel stays. This research involves an engaging online activity called Q-sorting, designed to map out various viewpoints about STRA. As a participant, you'll sort a range of statements regarding STRA based on your agreement or disagreement with them. Throughout the process, our researchers will engage with you to discuss your decisions and perspectives.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Source of funding:{{{/b}}} This project is funded by the Australian Housing and Urban Research Institute (AHURI).{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Consenting to participate in the project and withdrawing from the research:{{{/b}}} You have the right to withdraw from further participation at any stage.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Possible benefits and risks to participants:{{{/b}}} Participation in the activity is expected to take up to one hour, and as a token of our appreciation for your time, you will be reimbursed $100. The activity can be completed at a convenient time for you. The Q-sort activity and accompanying discussion will be recorded and transcribed. This research will provide information about STRA in Australia that may assist policymakers in making decisions about STRA regulations. There is little risk associated with participating in this study.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Confidentiality:{{{/b}}} The results of this research will be published as an AHURI Research Report and may also be shared in academic journal articles, at conferences or workshops, or in formats for a non-academic audience, e.g. blog posts. All results shared publicly will use only de-identified data. Your personal information will be provided to Monash Finance to process reimbursements and may be used for audit purposes.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Storage of data:{{{/b}}} Members of the research team are located at Monash University and the University of Adelaide. Data will be stored for five years on secure Monash University servers accessible only to members of the research team. Data will be destroyed after five years.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Consent:{{{/b}}} By clicking on the "Agree" button at the bottom of this page, you are indicating that you have read and understood the information provided, and that you agree to participate in this study.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
If you would like further information regarding any aspect of this project, you are encouraged to contact the Chief Investigator via the phone number or email address listed below.{{{br}}}{{{br}}}
{{{b}}}Dr Michaela Lang{{{/b}}}{{{br}}} Monash Sustainable Development Institute, Monash University{{{br}}} Phone: 0422 147 466{{{br}}} Email: michaela.lang@monash.edu{{{br}}}
Dr Michaela Lang{{{/b}}}{{{br}}} Monash Sustainable Development Institute, Monash University{{{br}}} Phone: 0422 147 466{{{br}}} Email: michaela.lang@monash.edu{{{br}}}
Preliminary Sorting
Agree (3)
Statements
No Strong Feelings (2)
Disagree (1)
Step 1 of 4
Read the following statements carefully and split them up into three piles: a pile for statements you tend to disagree with, a pile for cards you tend to agree with, and a pile for the rest. Changes can be made later.{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}If you want to read this instruction a second time, click the help-button at the bottom left corner.
Navigation Disabled
Please finish the preliminary sorting before going to the next step.
Preliminary Sorting Complete
You have completed this step. Please click the "Continue" button in the bottom right side of the page to go to the next step.
{{{div style="font-size: 24px"}}}Click and drag on the cards or press the "1", "2", or "3" keys to sort the statements.{{{/div}}}
To enlarge an image, hover your mouse pointer over it and double-click. {{{br/}}}{{{br/}}} To compare images, {{{u}}}press and hold{{{/u}}} the {{{b}}}{{{i}}}Shift{{{/i}}}{{{/b}}} key on your keyboard and then double-click on TWO images with your mouse.
Step 2 of 4
In this step, please click and drag the statement cards to the appropriate column based on your perspective and the researcher's instructions at the top of the page. The range is from -5 (disagree the most) to +5 (agree the most).
Most Agree
Most Disagree
How much do the following influence your decision about leasing in the short-term rental market(now or in the past)?
Sorting Complete
You have completed the initial sorting. Please take a moment to confirm your placement of the cards.{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}When you are satisfied with their placement, please click on the {{{b}}}blue "Continue" button{{{/b}}} at the bottom right-side of your screen to go to the next step.
Navigation Disabled
Please finish the grid sorting before going to the next step.
Navigation Disabled
One of the columns has too many cards (it will be outlined in orange and have a dashed border). Please adjust the placement of the cards so that all columns have the correct number.
Post-Sort Comments
{{{h3}}}Please describe your thoughts about these statements in more detail.{{{/h3}}}
Click here to add comment

You can use the buttons at the bottom of the page to change the font size or card height.

Final Step
{{{h1}}}Ready to Submit{{{/h1}}}{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}} {{{h2}}}Please click the "Submit Data" button to transmit your results.{{{/h2}}}
If the submission confirmation message does not appear, {{{br/}}}please wait a few minutes and click the submit button again.
Success - The data have been sent to the server.
Thank you for using EQ Web Sort!{{{br/}}}{{{br/}}}You can now close your browser tab.
Connection to server failed
Please try again in a few moments.
Data transmission has failed. Please download the results and email them as an attachment to michaela.lang@monash.edu. Thank you!
